tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE laws (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  law_name VARCHAR(255),
  enactment_date DATE,
  impact_on_society TEXT,
  evaluation_report TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Laws (
 law_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 law_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 enacted_date DATE,
 jurisdiction VARCHAR(100),
 description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Policies (
 policy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 policy_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 effective_date DATE,
 target_population TEXT,
 enforcement_agency VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE ImpactReports (
 report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 law_id UUID REFERENCES Laws(law_id),
 policy_id UUID REFERENCES Policies(policy_id),
 report_date DATE,
 demographics_report TEXT,
 impact_summary TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE impact_monitoring (
  monitoring_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  law_id INT REFERENCES laws(law_id),
  policy_id INT REFERENCES policies(policy_id),
  monitoring_date DATE,
  monitoring_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE impact_data (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    law_id INT,
    policy_id INT,
    impact_value FLOAT,
    impact_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE evaluation (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    law_id INT,
    policy_id INT,
    evaluation_result TEXT,
    evaluation_date DATE
);
